description: Scorpia (real name Elaine Colls) is a fictional super villain in the Marvel Comics universe. A psychotic female version of the Scorpion, Scorpia is a long-time enemy of Spider-Man. She was recruited by Silvermane from a mental hospital and given robotic armor which enhanced her strength and speed five hundred percent.
name: Scorpia
powers: Superhuman physical attributes derived from that of Scorpion
